minecraft:lore: {"translate":"The best climbers know how to fall, for","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"we must all find our place. Mine is","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"being cast down, so I can rise once","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"more! For after every defeat, I ran","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"could not keep up. One must stand back","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"up and never be defeated, your spear","color":"gray","italic":false}
{"translate":"forward is not the same as running from","color":"gray","italic":false}
